DOC.brief_summary: This single centre , Phase I , open-label , one cohort , one dose level , fixed-sequence , drug interaction study healthy volunteer . The objective study determine effect rifampin pharmacokinetics ataluren fast condition .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Nonsmoker ≥18 ≤55 year age Clinically significant laboratory , electrocardiogram , vital sign abnormality screen Positive urine drug screen screen History significant drug alcohol abuse Recent use medication topical product without significant systemic absorption Recent donation plasma blood loss blood
